name: places/ChIJ3yce1fxYwokRUCx9dU2c1MA
formattedAddress: 150 E 50th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 150 E 50th St, New York, NY 10022-9500, USA

editorialSummary.text: Upscale hotel with free Wi-Fi, plus an Indian restaurant & 24-hour exercise room.

originalText.text: Overall I had a great time here. If you want all the amenities views and bars and restaurants in your hotel this may not be the place for you. We wanted a nice sized comfortable room for both our families to relax after touring the city. And that’s exactly what we got. Rooms were huge compared to anything in the city. All the kids were comfortably hanging out together. The location was great and definitely walkable to most places. The rooms are a bit old but well maintained. Could definitely use an update. Service was good but we never really needed anything except toothpaste.

text.text: Overall I had a great time here. If you want all the amenities views and bars and restaurants in your hotel this may not be the place for you. All the kids were comfortably hanging out together. The location was great and definitely walkable to most places. The rooms are a bit old but well maintained. Could definitely use an update. Service was good but we never really needed anything except toothpaste.

originalText.text: This hotel was perfect for our family of 5. We had 2 junior suites. The rooms are spacious and clean. The staff is friendly and accommodating. It is located in a perfect location. You also have a New York restaurant across the street. It was a amazing experience.

text.text: This hotel was perfect for our family of 5. We had 2 junior suites. The rooms are spacious and clean. The staff is friendly and accommodating. It is located in a perfect location. You also have a New York restaurant across the street. It was a amazing experience.

originalText.text: We came to this hotel after a nightmare with another hotel. Nice, clean rooms with kitchenette standard in each room, excellent customer service from front desk staff and house keeping, and still not too far for my family to take 20 min walk to Times Square or hop in a taxi with low fare to go just about anywhere we wanted. The front desk staff even looked up restaurants for us and gave us late night suggestions for my pregnant cravings! Kind and caring staff and clean rooms with great location. Definitely recommend to stay here!

text.text: We came to this hotel after a nightmare with another hotel. The front desk staff even looked up restaurants for us and gave us late night suggestions for my pregnant cravings! Kind and caring staff and clean rooms with great location. Definitely recommend to stay here!

originalText.text: Safe quiet neighborhood. Check in and check out was fluid and easy. The bell hops took care of us right away to get our bags in and out efficiently. Service was 100%. Rooms are comfortable and large. Excellent place to stay.

text.text: Safe quiet neighborhood. Check in and check out was fluid and easy. The bell hops took care of us right away to get our bags in and out efficiently. Service was 100%. Rooms are comfortable and large. Excellent place to stay.

originalText.text:
We had a roll in shower room for my wheelchair user husband. It was very well appointed and roomy. Very quiet hotel, perfect after a long day pounding the streets and seeing New York's many sights.
The staff were fantastic and could not have been more helpful and happy, they were a joy to talk to.
Absolutely perfect location, just 10 mins walk from the Rockerfeller Plaza.
Cannot recommend highly enough. We will be back!
